players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I am not the one who killed Alice. I believe we should focus on finding the real culprit and work together as a team to ensure the safety of our village."
Charlie: "Bob, I don't think Diana is the killer. But we need to be careful and not jump to conclusions too quickly."
Diana: "I stand by my previous statement. I did not kill Alice and I believe we should keep an open mind to find the real killer."
